summary: |
  A Class.SensorBase that outputs data about how its Class.BasePart is

description: |
  A Class.SensorBase that outputs data about how its Class.BasePart is
  interacting with Class.Terrain water, allowing you to determine if the part
  is or is not in water.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - SensorBase

properties:
  - name: BuoyancySensor.FullySubmerged
    summary: |
      True when the entirety of the Class.BasePart is submerged in
      Class.Terrain water with at least one voxel of water above it.
    description: |
      This property is true when the entirety of the Class.BasePart is
      submerged in Class.Terrain water with at least one voxel of water above
      it.

    type: boolean
    tags: []

    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Output
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
  - name: BuoyancySensor.TouchingSurface
    summary: |
      True when any position on the Class.BasePart is touching Class.Terrain
      water.
    description: |
      This property is true when any position on the Class.BasePart is
      touching Class.Terrain water. The detection measurements are not exact
      and may use the bounding box of the part instead of its exact geometry.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
